extendedInfo.description: Send Free SMS all over India!Free India SMS brings the convenience of using SMS gateways right from your android phone as a standalone app.Just provide login details of any of the supported sms gateways to the app and you can send all the sms through this app.Tags: SMS, FREE, India, way2sms, indyarocksNeed not pay a single paisa for sms charge anymore.Free India SMS works over wifi/GPRS connection.Send mesages to group of friends day and night, all free of sms cost.If you have any gateway addition request or any new feature request do drop a mail to us.Your suggestion and feedback are most welcome.Please mail to droid.softsoln@gmail.comThis is to notify that the services being provided by this software are free to use by the user under below conditions: - 1> This is not the official app of any of the sms gateway mentioned about in this application.2> Developer of software will not be liable for any loss arising due to non-performance, ill-performance and specific performance of this software.3> Developer of this software is not legally bind for actual expected performance of this software.

reviews.title: Free India SMS
reviews.comment: Really its awesome. Able to logon to almost all free messaging websites.  The national flag colour given is really a nice thinking. A small draw back is, sender\'s mobile number alone flashes even though the sender\'s name is in receiver\'s contact list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but can be better....
reviews.comment: Out of the 2 star, one for simple nd effective interface, and another for fast msg delivery nd its indication....  Reason for not giving 3 star - 1. No option for switching gateway as there is only one gateway thru which I can send msg.  2. It tooks a very long tym in opening the msgs...dats very annoying.  3. There is always some scope of improvement so 1 star less for that....
reviews.author: A Google User
